name: via
posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

dsense.name: via
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: going through or stopping at a place on the way to another place

example.eg: The London-Addis flight goes via Rome.
example.egtrans: 从伦敦到阿迪斯的航班要途经罗马。

dsense.name: via
dsense.posTip: Word used before noun, pronoun or -ing form of verb to show place, direction, etc.

trans_examp.trans_en: using a particular machine, system, or person to send or receive something

example.eg: Reports are coming in via satellite.
example.egtrans: 报道通过卫星传送进来。

example.eg: I only found out about it via my sister.
example.egtrans: 我是从我姐姐那儿才知道了这件事。
